ygData.subject: Re: I know...
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought you were leaving the list.  I am most dissapointed to see you still here.  I hope you reconsider and do indeed leave us. If I have to beg I will,
ygData.messageBody:
I thought you were leaving the list. I am most dissapointed to see you still
here. I hope you reconsider and do indeed leave us. If I have to beg I will,
please, please, please leave the list. Because there is no way I would ever want
anyone to share anything with someone as selfish and egotistical as yourself.
We know you don't want to help us, and guess what. We don't want to help you.
So please remove yourself from this list. You are not wanted here.

Joshua Bednarz wrote:

> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
> I apologize, I didn't mean to come off sounding so pompous, and arrogant. I
> really was being pathetically immature, I guess it was just becuase I had
> just gotten a clue, that really helps the discovery or the pole. You see it
> would clear up alot, but I don't wish to tell because, I swore to the one
> who told me the clue that I wouldn't tell anyone what it was that he said,
> and I don't want to dishonor him, or myself. They hold this secret pretty
> close to thier hearts, and take it pretty seriously. I didn't want to
> decieve this person. I can, when I want to, use words with the most
> excellent of skill, like when I got a clue from the guy that part of this
> unknown organization, and I can also be a jerk and come off sounding like an
> 8 year old troll, as you have learned, well I'm sorry, and I hope you can
> understand why I feel that I must keep my knowledge a secret for now.
>
>

--Eron
aeron@...
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

from a real accident report:
"To avoid hitting the bumper of the car in front, I struck the pedestrian."
